Title: No Game No Life: Zero
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Romance
Writer: Yû Kamiya (based on the novel by), Jukki Hanada
Actors: Alexandra Bedford, Jessica Boone, Ricardo Contreras, Kregg Dailey
Plot: Adaption of the sixth Light Novel of series, it follows the story of two new characters - Riku and Shuvi - during the events of the Ancient War, prior to the 10 pledges.
